document.full_text: the detroit red wings rallied with a three-goal salvo in the final 10 minutes for a 3-1 win over the san jose sharks on tuesday, forcing a deciding game seven in their western conference semi-final series.
document.title: red wings force decider with 3-1 win over sharks
lines_and_colors: the detroit red wings rallied with a three-goal salvo in the final 10 minutes for a 3-1 win over the san jose sharks on tuesday, forcing a deciding game seven in their western conference semi-final series.
